home_what_i_do: I build amazing things for the web. 👷‍♂️ 🚀
home_my_jobs: I'm a Software Engineer.-I'm a Web Developer.-I'm a Technology Enthusiast.-Coffee, books and exercise lover.
about_desc_1: Front End Developer with background as a Computer Engineer. 👨‍💻 My interest in software development began in my first cycle of university, I was fascinated by the idea of automating tasks through programming. 🚀
about_desc_2: I am currently looking for a job opportunity, I am also improving my portfolio and doing personal projects. I am aware of the relevance of the English language in this industry, so I continue to improve my level.👷‍♂️
about_desc_3: I like riding a bike, 🚴‍♂️ going to the gym 🏋️‍♂️ and take a coffee ☕. I enjoy discovering the secrets of life through reading 📚 and I understand that we are always developing ♂️ 🧘 and what better than learning from others. Don't break the wheel. 🌀
about_desc_4: These are some technologies I've been working with lately 👇:
experience_0_overview: Develop systems and tools with an emphasis on performance and scalability, aimed at business customers with the Salesforce business ecosystem.
experience_1_overview: 6-month bootcamp, focused on the development of web applications with React, Redux, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, among other technologies. Carry out personal and collaborative projects to improve my skills and knowledge. 🚀 Work with the SCRUM methodology, using tools such as Trello and Slack for team communication and organization. 📝
experience_2_overview: I was in charge of the maintenance of the computer equipment of the company, as well as the installation of new equipment. I also provided technical support to the users of the company. 🖥️
experience_3_overview: Advice and support with the correct use of IT assets to administrative staff. Maintain and update the information published on the entity's website. Manage the correct use of the entity's network infrastructure.
projects_1_overview: Web application for managing cooking recipes.
projects_1_extended_overview: Individual project developed within Henry Bootcamp Development of a SPA (Single Page Application) using React for the Front End and Redux as state management. All components were developed with CSS without the use of external libraries. The SPA consumes data from an API (“Spoonacular API”) through a Back End developed in Node.JS using Express, adding new features to the original API such as the use of the ORM Sequelize to be able to connect to a PostgresSQL database and can store the data created by the user.
projects_2_overview: GameScript is a platform for buying and selling video games.
projects_2_extended_overview: Group project developed within Henry Bootcamp Development of an E-COMMERCE, for the purchase and sale of Video Games using React for the Front End and Redux Toolkit as state management. All components were designed using the Material UI Framework. The App consumes data through a Back End developed in Node.JS using Express, and for the connection to the database the Sequelize ORM with the PostgresSQL database engine was used. My main contribution to the project was the Front End part, applying good Front End practices, styling components with Material UI, reusing components and applying Stripe for the payment method.
projects_3_overview: Personal portfolio. A web page to show my projects.
projects_3_extended_overview: Individual developer project with React, Material UI and CSS. The objective of this project is to show my projects and skills as a Front End developer. The page consumes data from a JSON file to display the projects and their details. The page is optimized for mobile and desktop devices.
